widget.header: New Services-filtering Feature in the Justia Lawyer Directory!

clients.alt: New Services-filtering Feature in the Justia Lawyer Directory!
description: We are excited to announce a new Services-filtering Feature in the Justia Lawyer Directory, allowing users to easily find lawyers who provide particular services in a practice area. For example, users looking for business lawyers can filter to find those that provide “mergers and acquisitions” services, filter family lawyers to find those who offer “adoption” services, and filter injury lawyers to find those who handle "truck accidents".

As a courtesy, we have pre-populated your profile with all the service areas for the practice areas that you have listed. Read more about the services filter here, and be sure to keep your profile up to date so potential clients can find you!
